Articles.Content:
False, and you're just waiting for me to show up aren't you.

The user below me wants the schematics for the MjÃƒÂ¶lnir Type-10 Naval railgun used aboard the DSRV Dawn of Valhalla to obliterate ROFLCopter64bit's cute little toy satellite gun

True. Anything that is better than my design I will shamelessly steal and use it for my own.

It's simple as quantum math.

My design + your better design = My new design > your design

The user below me knows what quantum math is

True, but my forte is art and aviation

By the way, you aren't an experienced weapons technician or an engineer. Anything you design based on what I construct would likely blow itself up or implode due to powerful magnetic fields. And even if you manage to create a working knockoff of the Type-10 you still don't have an adequate targeting system, or tracking software, or proper turret assembly. Plus I wouldn't even need to fight railguns with railguns, I have MANY more tricks up my sleeves. Two words: Phasic tunneling.

The user below me needs a bath

If you don't have water... (Err... no.)

The next person is in North America.

How did you know?!

The person below me does not drink soda.

Over my dead body.

The person below me hates Mountain Dew, or has never had any of it.

False, second most likely to drink soda for me. (I don't always drink soda, but when I do, I prefer Dr. Pepper. Stay thirsty my friends.)

The user below me absolutely hates that commercial.

Meme? Awesome. Commercial? Not so much.

The user below me has used the word Truthiness in an everyday conversation.

False. (Also, I hate soft drinks)

By the way, you aren't an experienced weapons technician or an engineer. Anything you design based on what I construct would likely blow itself up or implode due to powerful magnetic fields. And even if you manage to create a working knockoff of the Type-10 you still don't have an adequate targeting system, or tracking software, or proper turret assembly. Plus I wouldn't even need to fight railguns with railguns, I have MANY more tricks up my sleeves. Two words: Phasic tunneling.

NUH UH! Two words for you: Quantum slipstreaming. It was designed for the Hyper-V, and please don't let me bring out the Hyper-V. If you don't want a Class X-2:6 removal on your hands.

The user below me would also not like a class X-2:6 removal.

Probably?

The person below me isn't ROFLcopter64bit.

True.

The user below me is building a base in the Bobcat challenge thread.

False. And you don't want a Class X-2:6 removal.

The user below me doesn't want one either.

False, I would love one of those!

(I googled and it brought me back to this post, what is it, anyway?)

The user below me has more than 0 blog posts.

False, if I wanted to blog... I WOULDN'T. *insert grumpy cat-esqe face*

The user below me has reached sub-orbit in a spaceplane using only air-breathing jet engines

True. Multiple times.

(I googled and it brought me back to this post, what is it, anyway?)

Metaphysical annihilation of a multi-stellar object. Multi-stellar as in a solid-death-beam the size of the Oort cloud. All this thanks to quantum slipstreaming.

The user below me knows how to abuse quantum slipstreaming.

What in the world was that?

The person below is a human.

True. Although you mucked up the question ("The user", not "The person", OCD is killing me)

The user below me also thinks OCD is killing them.

False, thats my brother.

User below complains about people on youtube rocket designs.

True, rockets made by YouTube would definitely not be safe enough to put people on.

The user below me is European.

False, 'Murican.

The user below me is in a place where it is currently raining outside.

False. (I love rain. I want to live in an area where it rains constantly.)

The user below me just woke up.

False, I have been awake for 73 hours now

The user below me has far better sleeping habits.

True, 8-10 hours of sleep.

The user below me has Poker Night at the Inventory 2, like me.

Nope, I don't have one.

User below me is not that awesome.

False!

The user below me likes to eat chicken.
